The solution process is walking in a beautiful way to Allah. We are witnessing beautiful developments in this region.
We pass through a beautiful process in which young people do not die, parents and sisters do not tear, everyone looks forward to coming with hope.
Turkey is standing upright on global affairs, walking with sure steps for the future. Turkey does not fall into the trap, it sets its own agenda.
In our agenda we have nation, service, cities to build airports, roads, hospitals, residences, schools.
We are not going after the virtual day, we are going to pursue more of our refuge.

We were in a determination and determination to finish this magnificent airport of 2 million square meters worthy of Bingöl's honor.
Tomorrow, official flights start. It cost 39 million liras in total. In this way, they will travel to the region and investments will increase.

I presided over a meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace in Abu Dhabi today evening http://t.co/tDTYAN5OU6

At the meeting, we affirmed that the UAE will remain as the founders wanted, a major station for humanitarian work, and the month of Ramadan will remain a season for good and giving to every needy person
At the meeting, we adopted an integrated proposal to organize the work of the Hajj and Umrah ... to develop services for pilgrims and Umrah, and to preserve the rights of all parties.
We also adopted a bill to change the name of the National Center for Documentation and Research to become (National Archives) .. being the official national archive of the state
This evening I chaired a cabinet session at the presidential palace in Abu Dhabi http://t.co/uywQWcL1jH
During the session we asserted that the UAE will always be a humanitarian hub and that Ramadan will always be an opportunity for giving
We also adopted a full-fledged proposal for Haj and Umrah to better organize and develop their services and reserve all parties' rights
We also adopted changing the name of The National Center for Documentation And Research to "The National Archive"
